title: health check endpoint returns accurate server_status_and_world_statistics
description: Verify that the /health GET endpoint returns a 200 status with a JSON body containing the server status as 'ok', current tick number, total agent count, and a valid timestamp.

title: agent registration returns valid_token_and_initial_position
description: Test the /v1/agents/enter POST endpoint with valid ownerId and optional visuals to ensure it returns a 200 status with a valid agentId, initial position coordinates, and a base64url-encoded JWT token with 24-hour expiry.

title: submit agent action validates_authentication_and_returns_processing_status
description: Test the /v1/agents/action POST endpoint by submitting various valid and invalid actions with and without authentication tokens to verify correct status codes (200, 400, 401) and response messages indicating queued, executed, or failed action processing.

title: get world state returns_agents_within_specified_radius_and_coordinates
description: Verify the /v1/world/state GET endpoint returns a 200 status with a JSON body containing the current tick and a list of agents filtered by the specified radius and center coordinates, including their id, position, color, and status.

title: get agent details returns_correct_agent_information_or_404
description: Test the /v1/agents/{id} GET endpoint with valid and invalid agent IDs to ensure it returns 200 with full agent details including position, status, and inventory, or 404 if the agent is not found.

title: delete agent enforces_authentication_and_ownership_restrictions
description: Verify the /v1/agents/{id} DELETE endpoint requires authentication and only allows deletion of agents owned by the authenticated user, returning 200 on success, 401 for unauthorized, 403 for forbidden deletion attempts, and 404 if the agent does not exist.

title: ai simulate world tick processes_world_state_and_user_action_correctly
description: Test the /api/simulate POST endpoint by submitting valid worldState objects and optional userAction strings to verify it returns 200 with updated agent states and new events, and returns 400 if worldState is missing.
